title: Chevrolet Corvette
summary: The Chevrolet Corvette, colloquially known as the  'Vette,[1] is a two-door, two-passenger luxury[2] sports car manufactured and marketed by Chevrolet across more than 60 years of production and eight design generations.[3][4] From 1953 to 2019, it was front-engined, and since 2020, it is mid-engined.[5] With its generations noted sequentially from C1 to C8, the Corvette serves as Chevrolet's halo vehicle and is noted for its performance and distinctive plastic bodywork, either fiberglass or composite.
